etomica.lattice.crystal

Class Basis

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.lattice.crystal.Basis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasisBetaSnA5, BasisBigCell, BasisCubicBcc, BasisCubicDiamond, BasisCubicFcc, BasisCubicFccDiamond, BasisHcp, BasisHcpBaseCentered, BasisMonatomic, BasisMonoclinicParacetamol, BasisOrthorhombicHexagonal, BasisOrthorhombicParacetamol, ConfigurationCatalysis.BasisOrthorhombicHexagonal3D

    public class Basis
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    General basis class that hold scaled coordinates of atoms within a unit cell.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Basis

        public Basis(IVector[] scaledCoordinates)
        Parameters:
        scaledCoordinates - basis coordinates for the case in which the primitive lattice constant (getSize) is unity. Given instance is kept for interal representation of basis, so changes to scaledCoordinates will affect the basis.

    • Method Detail

      • getScaledCoordinates

        public IVector[] getScaledCoordinates()
        Returns scaled coordinates
